Name: Have you completed a site induction?
Tag 1: Have you completed a site induction?

Name: Do you know the site’s health&safety rules?
Tag 1: Do you know the site’s health and safety rules?

Name: Are you familiar with security arrangements & the system for reporting incidents/near misses/hazards?
Tag 1: Are you familiar with security arrangements and the system for reporting incidents, near misses and hazards?

Name: Are you familiar with the emergency facilities & evacuation procedure/route for the site?
Tag 1: Are you familiar with the emergency facilities and evacuation procedure/route for the site?

Name: Do you have access to appropriate emergency & first aid equipment?
Tag 1: Do you have access to appropriate emergency and first aid equipment?

Name: Have you asked the person in charge about all relevant hazards?
Tag 1: Have you asked the person in charge about all relevant hazards?

Name: If the work involves a high risk task, has a safe work method statement/job safety analysis been completed?
Tag 1: If the work involves a high risk task (such as work at heights, hot-work, confined spaces), has a safe work method statement or job safety analysis been completed?

Name: Do you have the correct procedures/equipment/PPE to do the work safely?
Tag 1: Do you have the correct procedures, equipment and PPE to do the work safely?

Name: Has equipment that requires a lock/tag-out/power that requires isolation/containment been completed?
Tag 1: Has equipment that requires a lock/tag-out and/or power that requires isolation/containment been completed?

Name: Is there appropriate separation of vehicles & people during the proposed work?
Tag 1: Is there appropriate separation of vehicles and people during the proposed work?

Name: Is all required electrical/mechanical equipment in a safe condition?
Tag 1: Is all required electrical/mechanical equipment in a safe condition?

Name: Are all hazardous/dangerous goods/substances used & stored according to their material safety data sheets?
Tag 1: Are all hazardous and/or dangerous goods/substances used and stored according to their material safety data sheets?

Name: Have you consulted with all fellow workers about the task to be completed & the safe way to do it?
Tag 1: Have you consulted with all fellow workers about the task to be completed and the safe way to do it?

Name: Have you got a safe way of getting in & out of your work area?
Tag 1: Have you got a safe way of getting in and out of your work area?

Name: Have any manual handling risks been identified & assessed?
Tag 1: Have any manual handling risks been identified and assessed?
